name: Hackatron
about: A flagship hackathon challenging coders to solve real-life problems by developing innovative websites, apps, or desktop solutions.

description.overview: Hackatron is one of our flagship hackathon events, attracting widespread enthusiasm and huge participation in previous years. This hackathon provides a platform for coders, software programmers, and developers to build and design something unconventional. Participants will be tasked with solving nerve-wracking problem statements and developing a website, Android app, or desktop app within a limited time period, based on real-life problems.

regionals.overview: Preliminary round where teams submit a project summary.
entry_rules: No registration fees will be charged.
Teams must submit a one-page project summary adhering to submission guidelines.
The project must be submitted within the given time period on the specified platform.
The summary must include problem-solving steps and the solution's benefits to the community.
Graphics may be included if necessary, but they must be of reasonable, readable size and reflect original work.
The front page should include team name, members' names, college name, phone number, email address, and registered ID on the Infotsav website.
The judges' decision is final and binding.

onsite.overview: Final 36-hour round held at ABV-IIITM for selected teams.
entry_rules: A nominal fee will be charged per team for the Onsite round.
A maximum of seven teams will be selected from every region for the finals.
Participants must bring their own laptops, phones, and tablets.
Internet and infrastructure support will be provided, but the organizers will not be liable for any network failures.
Any kind of plagiarism will result in immediate disqualification.
By participating, participants agree that the Hackathlon organizers will not be liable for any disputes or damages related to the hackathon, its attendees, intellectual property, or related projects.

name: Code Rush
about: Battle it out in a high-octane competitive programming contest! Tackle algorithmic puzzles under pressure in this ultimate test of speed, logic, and precision. Only the quickest codes will rise to the top.

name: HardWired
about: A hands-on, hardware-focused innovation challenge where teams design, wire, program, and build working prototypes to solve real-workd problems. With themes like IoT, agriculture, and defense, it's all about turning bold ideas into functional, tangible tech.

description.overview: A hands-on, hardware-focused innovation challenge where teams design, wire, program, and build working prototypes to solve real-workd problems. With themes like IoT, agriculture, and defense, it's all about turning bold ideas into functional, tangible tech.

name: Ideathon
about: A challenge for the visionaries! Solve pressing problems using frontier tech - AI, ML, blockchain or Data Science. It's not just about ideas, it's about solutions that work, impress, and inspire. Present your innovation and make your pitch count.

description.overview: A challenge for the visionaries! Solve pressing problems using frontier tech - AI, ML, blockchain or Data Science. It's not just about ideas, it's about solutions that work, impress, and inspire. Present your innovation and make your pitch count.
